thread.title: Many Clouds collapses and dies just moments after beating Thistlecrack in Cheltenham thriller
thread.title_full: Many Clouds collapses and dies just moments after beating Thistlecrack in Cheltenham thriller

title: Many Clouds collapses and dies just moments after beating Thistlecrack in Cheltenham thriller
text: Many Clouds collapses and dies just moments after beating Thistlecrack in Cheltenham thriller Independent.ie Trainer Oliver Sherwood paid tribute to the "horse of a lifetime" after Many Clouds tragically collapsed and died following his shock defeat of Thistlecrack in the Cotswold Chase at Cheltenham. http://www.independent.ie/sport/horse-racing/many-clouds-collapses-and-dies-just-moments-after-beating-thistlecrack-in-cheltenham-thriller-35405587.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35405586.ece/8dfbe/AUTOCROP/h342/many%20clouds.jpg LIVERPOOL, ENGLAND - APRIL 11: Many Clouds ridden by Leighton Aspell wins the 2015 Crabbie's Grand National at Aintree Racecourse on April 11, 2015 in Liverpool, England. (Photo by Alex Livesey/Getty Images) Trainer Oliver Sherwood paid tribute to the "horse of a lifetime" after Many Clouds tragically collapsed and died following his shock defeat of Thistlecrack in the Cotswold Chase at Cheltenham.
